profile:
Smooth Ceiling Ltd
Smooth Ceiling specializes in removing stipple, other know as stucco/popcorn from your ceilings. 
Our team take pride in the work we do and we ourselves on making sure we get the job done right, and on your time schedule. Each area is covered and protected from floor to ceiling to ensure that dust does not seep through out the house. We specialize in turning your stucco ceiling to a smooth and perfect finish. 
We're dedicated to providing you the resources and services you need to modernize your home., 
We remove your outdated popcorn ceiling in a fast, clean and efficient manner.
Acoustic ceiling also known as the "popcorn ceiling" was in fashion over thirty years ago, but now new houses do not have these ceilings unless you request it prior to a new home being built.
Many home owners are also removing the stipple in their homes for benefits such as

Many benefits to the removal of Popcorn/Acoustic Ceilings:
	•	Brightens the room 
	•	Increase Re-sale Value
	•	Damage Control
        •	Modernizes the look      
	•	Less Dust and les Spider Webs
	•	Cleaner, Professional Look
	•	And much more…

Popcorn Ceiling Removal / Stucco Removal - Painting - Water Damaged Ceilings - Drywall Repairs - Pot Lights- Crown Moulding-Custom Kitchens-Custom Closets
service_area: Richmond Hill, Markham, Thornhill, Vaughn, Woodbridge, Toronto,  Stoufville, Kleinburg, Maple, KIng City. North York, Scarborough, Etobicoke
services: Popcorn ceiling removal / stucco removal - Painting - Water Damaged Ceilings - Drywall Repairs - Pot Lights- Crown Moulding-Custom Kitchens-Custom Closets
brands: Smooth Ceiling Ltd works with the highest quality of material such as  Benjamin Moore CGC plaster, Anchore protective Paper etc
specialities: We specialize in transforming your rough outdated ceiling into a  work of art.  We make sure that we meet your budget and time line. We protect your floors and walls from top to bottom to ensure that the dust does not seep into other rooms nor your furnace. We close off your vents and air intakes.  We use a wet method to remove the stucco "popcorn", then apply multiple coats of plaster to you're ceiling to insure the stability and longevity. We then use an LED to double check for any imperfections we might of missed. We feather sand the ceiling to a smooth finish and proceed by priming and painting the project with a top Benjamin Moore prime and paint. We finish the job by cleaning the work area and disposing the garbage.
name: Smooth Ceiling Ltd

profile:
The Home Improvement Group is the premier One Stop Shop for all of your home and office renovations needs.  We have multiple divisions such as Perfect Painter, Affinity Renovations, Perfect Handyman and formally  Mr. Rescue to service all your needs. 

We service work form $400.00 to $500,000.00+ from our Painter and Handyman of the Day Service to  Home Additions and Major Renovation and Structural work.   We want to earn your trust and as a family owned business that delivers on providing outstanding home/office renovation work. 

Not convinced we have enough renovation reviews please see Perfect Painters & Home Renovations Services for a more detailed list on reviews.

We have a commitment to Quality work and dealing with a no risk contractor and we will always compete for your business.


We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmark, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

Call or email us at sales@thig.pro for all your renovation needs

We also have Master Electricians, Master Plumbers and Gas and HVAC members as a part of our team.

profile:
Ceiling Champions services the GTA and surrounding area's for stucco "popcorn" removal, repair, and refinishing of ceilings. We also can provide you with Crown Moulding, Painting, and PotLights. We also renovate Kitchens, Bathroom, and Cabinet Designs.

Ceiling Champions are here to restore or improve your ceiling or renovation project to 100% and beyond. Our top quality workmanship and attention to detail continue to earn confidence with homeowners in the GTA.

If you’re in the GTA; Etobicoke, Mississauga, Brampton, Ajax, Pickering, Oakville or nearby area, please give us a call to discuss stucco removal, ceiling repair, custom closets, kitchens & bathrooms, Crown Moulding or any other drywall related renovation.

R.M.G. Contracting Inc been around since 2010 , we are specialized in popcorn removal , taping new drywall, plaster repairs, and painting. We always make sure the job is done on time , to perfection, and clean the whole way through. 

Pricing:
- Non-painted stucco $3.50 per sqf. including painting the ceilings , protect the floors and cleaning.
- Painted stucco $4.50 per sqf. Price is fixed - no hidden fees.

profile:
ALF PAINTING SERVICE

If you're looking for a professional painting and home renovation company with years of experience to prove it, then look no further, ALF Painters is the contractor for you. We specialize in interior, exterior, residential, and commercial painting and our services don't stop there! We can also help you with drywall repair and installation, plaster, stucco ceiling repair and removal, carpentry, Kitchen Cabinet repainting, hardwood flooring and much more! Call one of our customer service experts now and be well on your way to a quote and a beautifully transformed property.

Serving Toronto, Mississauga and the grater GTA area!

Remember when you go with ALF Painting Service we value your business and referrals and are committed to getting it done right the first time. GUARANTEED!

Why use Home Painters to paint your house/office?
•Two Year Guarantee On All Work Done
•Full Workers Compensation
•5 Million Liability Insurance
•Fully Bonded Workers (Criminal Background Checks on ALL Workers)
•Thousands of Satisfied Clients
•Top Quality Paints Used Including Benjamin Moore, Dulux, Behr, Sherwin Williams, Para etc
•Drop sheets to Protect Your Floors and Belongings
•100% Satisfaction Guaranteed!!

Interior Painting Services Include:
•Painting (i.e. walls, trim, doors, floors, ceilings, etc.)
•Staining (i.e. banisters, hardwood floors, cabinets, etc.)
•Faux finishing
•Stucco Painting and Repair
•Wallpapering and Removal
•Drywall Repair and Replacement
•Plaster

Exterior Painting Services Include:
•Painting Exterior Surfaces (ie. windows, brick, doors, eaves, soffits, aluminum siding, etc.)
•Deck/Fence Staining and Refinishing
•Power Washing
•Caulking
•Rotten Wood Replacement/Repair

profile:
Northern Level Contractors is a proudly Canadian contracting company. The team specializes in commercial and residential steel framing, insulation , drywall ,   acoustic systems,   plaster/tape  and  modular/PVC ceilings  .
Having been in the business for over 8 years leading as drywall contractors, we are proud to say that our passion and experience have yielded us exceptional projects. Most importantly, long-lasting relationships with major clients across North America.

We are not only proud of our level of work, but also of the customer relationships we have built over the years. Now, we ask for an opportunity to build a relationship with you, learn more about your project and be able to bring your next dream to real life. Our team will take your design ideas to the next level.

Juio Lima 
Owner and President of Northern Level Contractors

profile: Ambassador Pro Painters was established in 2004 with the goal of providing top quality house painting services in the Tri City and surrounding area. (Kitchener, Waterloo, Cambridge). Over the years, we have developed and drawn from our experiences and have since become the leading painting contractors. Our reputation is build up on years of experience, referrals, and word of mouth. Painting is our passion and professionalism.
services:
Popcorn Acoustic Ceiling Texture - Remove
Residential - Interior Painting, Exterior Painting
Commercial Painting
Plastering 
Remove Wallpaper
Refinish Cabinets
Exterior Painting
Interior Painting 
Epoxy Flooring
Pressure Washing
payment_method: Cash, Credit, Debit, E-Transfer and Cheque
warranty_terms: Ambassador Pro Painters warrants labor and materials for a period of one year
